alert.note: Alert for Dane; Green; Iowa; Lafayette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 18 at 6:27PM CST by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT LAFAYETTE...NORTHERN GREEN...IOWA AND SOUTHWESTERN DANE COUNTIES... At 626 PM CST, a snow squall was located along a line extending from near Spring Green to Fennimore to near Guttenberg. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. Locations impacted include... Western Madison, Fitchburg, Stoughton, Verona, Oregon, Mount Horeb, Dodgeville, Mineral Point, Darlington, Belleville, New Glarus, Brooklyn, Shullsburg, Monticello, Belmont, Benton, Argyle, Blanchardville, Barneveld and Wiota. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this dangerous snow squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the squall passes your location. A rapid drop in temperatures will lead to the rapid formation of black ice on area roadways. Black ice is nearly impossible to see and roadways may appear wet. Please use extreme caution, especially on bridges, overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
